entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
